statement.p: In 63.64 of the last 22 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{22}}={0.6364}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{22}. \displaystyle{P}={0.6364}\cdot{22}={14.0008}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 22-14.0008=7.9992 We round that as requested to 8.
